Name: Current Ring
LongDescription: Boosts maximum PP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Elekid, Electabuzz, and Electivire.  You can get a Current Ring at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: an Elekid Claw, an Elekid Card, and a Jolt Charm. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
